body_html:
Hello,
I've opened this PR today: #1771
It includes most of the modifications commented here:

  • All the code is now contained into contrib/go
  • Improved test coverage
  • Added methods to create tensors, populate them, read the content, etc.
  • Graph generation, now it is possible to build the Graph from Go
  • Modified the "Image Recognition" tutorial to include a section similar to the C++ API section but using the Go API, also the code was ported to Go
  • Code updated to work with the 7.1 version
  • Code commented, GoLint doesn't complains

Thanks,
body_text:
Hello,
I've opened this PR today: #1771
It includes most of the modifications commented here:

All the code is now contained into contrib/go
Improved test coverage
Added methods to create tensors, populate them, read the content, etc.
Graph generation, now it is possible to build the Graph from Go
Modified the "Image Recognition" tutorial to include a section similar to the C++ API section but using the Go API, also the code was ported to Go
Code updated to work with the 7.1 version
Code commented, GoLint doesn't complains

Thanks,
body:
Hello,
I've opened this PR today: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/1771/
It includes most of the modifications commented here:
- All the code is now contained into contrib/go
- Improved test coverage
- Added methods to create tensors, populate them, read the content, etc.
- Graph generation, now it is possible to build the Graph from Go
- Modified the "Image Recognition" tutorial to include a section similar to the C++ API section but using the Go API, also the code was ported to Go
- Code updated to work with the 7.1 version
- Code commented, GoLint doesn't complains

Thanks,
